response.original_title: Performance-for-Camera: Jose Richard Aviles/ Luna y Los Gabrieles
response.overview: L.A.-based performance artist Jose Richard Aviles re-imagines Ana Gabriel and Juan Gabriel as romantic lovers, while reckoning with queer desire and nameless lovers in Juan Gabriel's classic ballad, "Luna", written for and performed by Ana Gabriel
response.title: Performance-for-Camera: Jose Richard Aviles/ Luna y Los Gabrieles
